room_title: Escape room "Empire City: Villain" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Cool with josh. Had fun will be back

room_title: Escape room "Empire City: Villain" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Just finished up with a small group and we had a blast. Sam was our host and was extremely helpful during our first escape room experience. I would highly recommend this as a fun activity with a group, and I look forward to coming back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Empire City: Villain" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I am an escape room enthusiast and have done over 360 rooms.  I have been to both of their locations and have done most of the rooms.  The games are very well organized, staff are always professional and friendly.  I highly recommend if you enjoy escape room.  It's great for birthday party's and corporation team building.
